/* 게시글 목록 조회 */ SELECT T2.no , T2.BOARD_NO AS boardNo , T2.TITLE AS title , T2.CONTENT AS content , T2.WRITER AS writer , T2.USE_YN AS userYn , TO_CHAR(T2.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regDate , NVL(TO_CHAR(T2.MOD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'수정사항 없음') AS modDate FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS no , T1.BOARD_NO , T1.TITLE , T1.CONTENT , T1.WRITER , T1.USE_YN , T1.REG_DATE , T1.MOD_DATE FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , USE_YN , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE FROM BOARD_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC ) T1 WHERE ROWNUM <= 30 ) T2 WHERE T2.no >= 21
/* 게시글 상세 조회 */ SELECT BOARD_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , WRITER , USE_YN , REG_DATE , MOD_DATE FROM BOARD_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
